languages.text: "Довольно". {n}Голос Хейнрикса дрожит от затаенной ярости.{/n} "Я слышал подобные оправдания и скулеж сотни раз. Ни одна цель не оправдывает того, что ты здесь сотворила! Кем ты стала!"

"That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"
languages.original_text: "Довольно". {n}Голос Хейнрикса дрожит от затаенной ярости.{/n} "Я слышал подобные оправдания и скулеж сотни раз. Ни одна цель не оправдывает того, что ты здесь сотворила! Кем ты стала!"

traits.locale_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “够了。”{n}海因里希的声音愤怒地颤抖着。{/n}“类似的辩解与抱怨，我已经听过不知道几百遍了。无论你出于什么目的，都无法为你的所作所为开脱！看看你变成了什么样子！”
languages.original_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"

traits.locale_text: “够了。”{n}海因里希的声音愤怒地颤抖着。{/n}“类似的辩解与抱怨，我已经听过不知道几百遍了。无论你出于什么目的，都无法为你的所作所为开脱！看看你变成了什么样子！”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Ya basta». {n}La voz de Heinrix tiembla con ira contenida.{/n} «He oído todas esas justificaciones y quejas cientos de veces. ¡Ningún propósito puede justificar lo que ha desatado aquí! ¡En lo que se ha convertido!».
languages.original_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"

traits.locale_text: «Ya basta». {n}La voz de Heinrix tiembla con ira contenida.{/n} «He oído todas esas justificaciones y quejas cientos de veces. ¡Ningún propósito puede justificar lo que ha desatado aquí! ¡En lo que se ha convertido!».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「それで十分だ」{n}ハインリックスの声が抑制された怒りで震える。{/n}「我はこれまでにあらゆる正当化や苦情を百回も聞いてきました。あなたがここで成し遂げたことを正当化できるような目的などない！あなたは変わってしまった！」
languages.original_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"

traits.locale_text: 「それで十分だ」{n}ハインリックスの声が抑制された怒りで震える。{/n}「我はこれまでにあらゆる正当化や苦情を百回も聞いてきました。あなたがここで成し遂げたことを正当化できるような目的などない！あなたは変わってしまった！」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Assez. » {n}Le tremblement dans la voix d'Heinrix laisse transparaître une colère maîtrisée.{/n} « J'ai déjà entendu ces justifications et ces plaintes des centaines de fois. Aucune ambition ne saurait justifier ce que vous avez fait ici ! Ce que vous êtes devenue ! »
languages.original_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"

traits.locale_text: « Assez. » {n}Le tremblement dans la voix d'Heinrix laisse transparaître une colère maîtrisée.{/n} « J'ai déjà entendu ces justifications et ces plaintes des centaines de fois. Aucune ambition ne saurait justifier ce que vous avez fait ici ! Ce que vous êtes devenue ! »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Genug jetzt!" {n}Heinrix' Stimme zittert vor unterdrücktem Zorn.{/n} "Ich habe sämtliche Rechtfertigungen und Beschwerden schon hundertmal gehört. Kein Zweck heiligt, was Ihr hier getan habt! Was aus Euch geworden ist!"
languages.original_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"

traits.locale_text: "Genug jetzt!" {n}Heinrix' Stimme zittert vor unterdrücktem Zorn.{/n} "Ich habe sämtliche Rechtfertigungen und Beschwerden schon hundertmal gehört. Kein Zweck heiligt, was Ihr hier getan habt! Was aus Euch geworden ist!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bu kadar yeter." {n}Heinrix'in sesi, dizginlenmiş bir öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Tüm bu mazeretleri ve şikâyetleri daha önce yüz kere duydum. Burada yaptığın şeyi, dönüştüğün bu şeyi hiçbir amaç haklı çıkaramaz!"
languages.original_text: "That is enough." {n}Heinrix's voice shakes with bridled fury.{/n} "I have heard all the justifications and complaints a hundred times before. No purpose can justify what you have wrought here! Who you have become!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu kadar yeter." {n}Heinrix'in sesi dizginlenmiş bir öfkeyle titriyor.{/n} "Her türlü mazereti ve şikâyeti daha önce yüz kere duymuşumdur. Burada yaptığın şeyi ve dönüştüğün bu şeyi hiçbir amaç haklı çıkaramaz!"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
